item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Alex. Welcome to my attempt at documenting what I do and why I do it. A bit about me I’m a technical person who sometimes gets very opinionated on subjects that I’ve spent a lot of time getting into. I learn a lot every month of my life, and in order to see that I was wrong at some stuff, I need a blog. My day job is a software engineer, which is a fancy way of saying that I’m good at telling computers what to do really well and quite fast.
